makefile.raw:
include $(PAPARAZZI_HOME)/sw/ext/ardrone2_vision/Makefile.paths
VISION_MODULE_FOLDER = $(DIR_MODULES)/StereoAvoid
$(TARGET).srcs += $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/avoid_navigation.c $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -I$(DIR_MODULES) -I$(DIR_CV) -I$(DIR_LIB) $(TARGET).LDFLAGS += -lrt
ifeq ($(TARGET),ap) $(TARGET).srcs += $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/stereo_avoid.c $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART1 -DUART1_BAUD=B9600 endif
ifneq ($(TARGET),ap) $(TARGET).srcs += $(VISION_MODULE_FOLDER)/stereo_avoid_sim.c endif
